title: Well, If It Isn't a Brand New Bouncing Baby Constitutional Crisis!
description:
We're finally getting there folks.  It is not the government shutdown.  It is not the hyper-politicization of everything.  But thanks to Donald Trump and recent revelations about the Russia probe, we may be getting to a point where even persnickety legal experts like our own Rosa Brooks acknowledge that America is on the verge of a constitutional crisis.  A big one.  The likes of which we haven't seen in decades.  Join Rosa, Kori Schake of IISS, David Sanger of the New York Times and Evelyn Farkas of the German Marshall Fund for a discussion of the latest bombshells that have helped bring the impending crisis into clearer view.Support this show http://supporter.acast.com/deepstateradio.
 See acast.com/privacy for privacy and opt-out information.

We're finally getting there folks. It is not the government shutdown. It is not the hyper-politicization of everything. But thanks to Donald Trump and recent revelations about the Russia probe, we may be getting to a point where even persnickety legal experts like our own Rosa Brooks acknowledge that America is on the verge of a constitutional crisis. A big one. The likes of which we haven't seen in decades.
